text: Miranshah () is a town in North Waziristan Agency and the capital city of Federally Administered Tribal Areas (FATA). in Pakistan. It houses a large refugee camp for displaced Afghans from the time of the Soviet war in Afghanistan. It is otherwise not a very notable place, with few amenities or comforts. Category:Capital cities in Pakistan Category:Federally Administered Tribal Areas Category:Tehsils of North Waziristan District
title: Miran Shah
